name: Lernerfolg Grundschule Englisch
overview: The award-winning educational game series Successfully Learning comes to the Wii. The elementary school training is fun and exercises your English skills. As a reward for success in learning you unlock exciting bonus games. 10 topics of the curriculum varied exercises are selected in four difficulty levels. Heard, spoken, read and written. Many varied exercises in a comfortable design make primary school English true experts! Features: Improved school performance by specific practice, and varied forms of exercises in a motivating atmosphere.
